price: „Не“, одговорише, „али ми смо упамтили наше претке како тако поступају.“
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
